<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cascade Bearer's Flexibility](/Feats.aspx?ID=1105) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 101 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Magaambyan Attendant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=29)

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Magaambyan Attendant Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1102); Cascade Bearers affiliation

**Requirements**
You haven’t yet acted on your turn.

</column>

---

You call upon your Cascade Bearer training to help you adjust a spell for the current situation. Until the end of your turn, you gain a single [metamagic feat](/Feats.aspx?Traits=107) from the druid class or the wizard class that has a level requirement of no more than half your level.
name: Cascade Bearer's Flexibility
prerequisite: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Cascade Bearers affiliation
requirement: You haven’t yet acted on your turn.
